get.summary: Get a list of the current available ads. Detects region-based ads by the client IP address.

Returns information about a specific product. If an error occurred, an object with property "ExceptionMessage" (string) will be returned.
Pricing and availability of a product is subject to the region from which this request is made, which is determined by IP address.

IsCurrentSelection.description: Whether the this price level is the currently selected option

PriceAmount.description: Amount, in USD. Already formatted for display.

PriceAmountDecimal.description: Amount, in USD. No formatting applied.

PriceLabel.description: The type of price this is. Only has meaning to a trained salesperson.

PriceRegion.description: The store region this price is applicable to. Represented as a region code, only has meaning to a salesperson.

adID.description: The system-assigned unique identifier for this ad

title.description: The user-friendly description of the ad

startDate.description: The first day the ad is active

endDate.description: The last day the ad is active

thumbnailURL.description: The URL to the image of the front cover / first page of the ad. Example: http://www.nfm.com/Marketing/20141222/files/assets/flash/pages/page0001.jpg

flipBkURL.description: The URL of the root FlipBk page. This page automatically detects whether to deliver the flash or mobile version. Example: http://www.nfm.com/Marketing/20141222/index.html

flipBkRootPath.description:
The root URL that the FlipBk resources are kept. Example: http://www.nfm.com/Marketing/20141222/
Can be appended to, in case you want to look at files deeper within the FlipBk structure.

kioskFriendlyAdViewerURL.description: The URL that the kiosk can display the ad flyer

pdfURL.description: The URL of the PDF. Example: http://www.nfm.com/Marketing/20141222/files/assets/common/downloads/publication.pdf

Model.description: The model name of the product, if exists

Brand.description: The brand name of the product, if exists

UPC.description: The UPC of the product, if exists

Description.description: The description of the product, if exists

LargeImageURLs.description: If product images exist, returns an array of full URLs for the image path, in the "large" size

MediumImageURLs.description: If product images exist, returns an array of full URLs for the image path, in the "medium" size

Price_MSRP.description: The MSRP price of the product

Price_CURR.description: The current price of the product

FloorLocations.description: The location(s) the product exists on the floor. Coordinates are returned as Meridian placemarks.
